pages.text: Only the diamond mortar is shown here. Most minerals can be powdered with a mortar.

Primary beater, right click on the controller in JEI to view the multi-cube structure diagram. If you have enough building cubes on you, use the wooden stick to right click the controller to build quickly.

Advanced beater, right click on the controller in JEI to view the multi-cube structure diagram. If you have enough building cubes on you, you can build them quickly by using the wooden stick and right-clicking the controller.
